Stanza 1:
mun pakkam pin pakkam yEdhO inbangaL thenpattadhO

then patta angangaL yAvum kaN pattu puN pattadhO

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
nEtrandhi nEraTHil pArTHEn AsaigAL vEr vittadhO 
vEr vitta Asaikku nee thAn neer vitta nEram idhO 
neelam pooTHa pArvayil kAdhal pooTHa vELayiL nANam thOndralAm
